def max_possible_value(N, values, weights, queries):
    MX = 10 * 5
    H = min(N + 1, 1 << 10)
    dp = [None] * H
    dp[0] = [0] * (MX + 1)
    IV = []
    IW = []
    for i in range(1, N + 1):
        v = values[i - 1]
        w = weights[i - 1]
        if i < H:
            dpi = dp[i >> 1][:]
            dp[i] = dpi
            for j in range(MX, w - 1, -1):
                dpi[j] = max(dpi[j], dpi[j - w] + v)
        else:
            IV.append(v)
            IW.append(w)
    results = []
    for (v, L) in queries:
        if v < H:
            results.append(dp[v][L])
            continue
        item_values = []
        item_weights = []
        while v >= H:
            item_values.append(IV[v - H])
            item_weights.append(IW[v - H])
            v >>= 1
        l = len(item_values)
        V = [0] * (1 << l)
        W = [0] * (1 << l)
        ans = dp[v][L]
        for i in range(1, 1 << l):
            msb = i & -i
            msbb = msb.bit_length() - 1
            wi = W[i - msb] + item_weights[msbb]
            W[i] = wi
            if wi <= L:
                vi = V[i - msb] + item_values[msbb]
                ans = max(ans, vi + dp[v][L - wi])
                V[i] = vi
        results.append(ans)
    return results
